title: 24-Hour KJV Seminar - Dr. Samuel C. Gipp
description:
The 24-Hour KJV Seminar is a brand new opportunity to receive seminary-level instruction by Dr. Sam Gipp on the history of the King James Bible, packed into 2 days. Attendees will not only learn volumes about their Bible and how they got it, but will be trained in how to defend it.

Some of the subjects that will be covered:
-Who was Desiderius Erasmus?
-Where was the Bible before 1611?
-The Bible through history
-The sinister altering of the classification some of biblical manuscripts: Who did it? How did they do it? When did they do it? Where did they do it?
-Westcott & Hort lived almost 150 years ago. The adversaries of the KJB in the 21st Century.
-Inspiration from all aspects.
-The LXX
-The Apocrypha
-The Hexapla
-And many more subjects



Dr. Gipp is a former pastor, an evangelist, teacher, author and Bible conference speaker. He has the unique ability to digest large amounts of information and then present it in an analytical, understandable, format. His humerous, informative and forceful preaching style make him popular with all ages and keeps him in demand as a Revivalist and Bible conference speaker.
